blogPost.excerpt: Wrekt is a social deduction game meant to be played with groups. Use it to split the bill at the end of a meal or just play for fun!
blogPost.body: Wrekt is a social deduction game meant to be played with groups. Use it to split the bill at the end of a meal or just play for fun!
blogPost.title: Wrekt - A social deduction bill splitting game
blogPost.author: andy wang

localize.description: Wrekt是一款旨在与团队一起玩的社交演绎游戏。在用餐结束时用它来分摊账单，或者只是为了好玩而玩！
localize.tagline: 一个社会扣除额拆分博弈

localize.description: Wrekt是一款旨在與團隊一起玩的社交演繹遊戲。在用餐結束時用它來分攤賬單，或者只是爲了好玩而玩！
localize.tagline: 一個社會扣除額拆分博弈

previous.excerpt: dev-flow is a website where you can view any person's GitHub statistics and timeline by entering their GitHub username.
previous.title: dev-flow - View GitHub statistics and timeline by username.

localize.description: Dev-Flow是一个网站，在这里你可以通过输入任何人的GitHub用户名来查看他们的GitHub统计数据和时间表。
localize.tagline: 按用户名查看GitHub统计数据和时间表。

localize.description: Dev-Flow是一個網站，在這裏你可以通過輸入任何人的GitHub用戶名來查看他們的GitHub統計數據和時間表。
localize.tagline: 按用戶名查看GitHub統計數據和時間表。

next.excerpt: Get smarter in just a few minutes every week. Read the key insights from your favourite books in minutes with our in-short summaries packed with actionable tips. P.s It's free to sign up!
next.title: Readinshort - Read the key insights from your favourite books in minutes.

localize.description: 每周只需几分钟就能变得更聪明。在几分钟内阅读您最喜欢的书籍中的关键洞察力，我们的简短摘要中充斥着可行的提示。另外，注册是免费的！
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内阅读你最喜欢的书中的关键洞察力。

localize.description: 每週只需幾分鐘就能變得更聰明。在幾分鐘內閱讀您最喜歡的書籍中的關鍵洞察力，我們的簡短摘要中充斥着可行的提示。另外，註冊是免費的！
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內閱讀你最喜歡的書中的關鍵洞察力。
